links.description: Veteran trader Steve Miller projects the S&P 500 (SPX) to decline to 2630 in the coming week as the stock market continues the declining phase of its current market cycle. His stock market cycle outlook sees more downside followed by a strong bounce.

Apple planning cheaper MacBook Air, branded headphones this year? https://seekingalpha.com/news/3336319-apple-planning-cheaper-macbook-air-branded-headphones-year

links.title: Apple planning cheaper MacBook Air, branded headphones this year?
links.description: KGI analyst Ming-Chi Kuo says Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) could launch a cheaper MacBook Air in Q2. Kuo forecasts MacBook total shipments to grow 10% to 15% on the year in 2018, compared to the up to 5% decline for the overall Notebook industry. MacBook shipments totaled 15.5M to 16M units last year.
